nodes.text: The pulse-wave rifle was a larger, rifle version of the pulse-wave pistol. Like the pistol version, the pulse-wave rifle was able to deal more damage at close range, but was less effective at long range.
The pulse-wave rifle cost 550 credits. It weighed 4 kilograms and fired 50 shots before its power pack needed to be replaced.

Variants of this weapon included the Type A pulse-wave rifle manufactured by Greff-Timms Industrial, the P-301 pulse-wave sniper rifle, the J-301 Pulse-Wave Saboteur, and the M-110 Pulse-Wave Disruptor.
The Juggernaut war droids of the Galactic Republic used a pulse-wave rifle as their primary weapon.
